ClassDef.Name: Vehicle

Properties.Name: MaxSpeed
Properties.Description: Determines the forward force limit in kg/s.

Properties.Name: SteerLimit
Properties.Description: Determines the steering limit in degrees.

Properties.Name: Force
Properties.Description: Determines the forward force in kg/s.

Properties.Name: Brake
Properties.Description: Determines the break amount in kg/s.

Properties.Name: Steering
Properties.Description: Determines the steering angle in degrees

Properties.Name: Driver
Properties.Description: Determines the current driver of this vehicle.

ClassDef.Description: Vehicle class represents a vehicle that can be driven by a player
